events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund for my order as soon as possible.
The customer issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster due to the request for money back.
Assigning support agent Emily R. to handle the refund request for the customer complaint.
Hello, this is Emily from customer support. I understand you'd like a refund and I am here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 98237465. I've attached a photo showing the item does not match my original order.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund immediately and send you instructions to return the wrong item.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the prompt handling of my refund request.
Your refund has been processed successfully, and you will receive the amount within 3-5 business days.
We are following up to ensure you received your refund and that the issue has been fully resolved to your satisfaction.
Since you confirmed satisfaction with the refund, we are now closing your support case. Thank you for contacting us.
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey to let us know how we did handling your refund.
